description:
A free and open-source tool to visualize your keystrokes in real-time.


ðŸš€ Whatâ€™s New?
- Mouse Indicators: Now show clicks and scrolls alongside your cursor.
- Custom Filters: Per-key control over what is visualized.
- Press Count: A new bubble-style counter to track your keypresses.
âœ¨ Big Changes
- Rebuilt with Rust ðŸ¦€: I started from scratch! The app is now faster, more stable, and acts like a native desktop app.
- Tiny Footprint: Shrunk the app size down to just ~4MB.
- Style Backups: You can now export and backup your Kecap styles as .json files.
- Windows Verified: No more security warningsâ€”the Windows app is now officially code-signed.
Special thanks to our early testers in the Discord community and the contributors in #272 for inspiring the new Mouse Indicator feature.
